attributes.action: Every person arrested for law-breaking during the recent riots across the UK, be pardoned and forgiven, and their records be expunged
attributes.additional_details:
All recent rioters must be forgiven and excused.  They have, and continue to be, provoked by their  'fathers' - successive irrresponsible British governments. The British Government is guilty and must apologise.
Politicians, over the last 3 decades, have been negligent and have let down the younger generations and provoked them to feelings of anger and hopelessness by permitting the de-industrialisation of Britain and the out-sourcing of jobs to foreign countries. English Law is Bible-based:
King James Version
Ephesians 6. http://bible.cc/ephesians/6-4.htm
4. And, ye fathers, provoke not your children to wrath: but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord.

Colossians 3. http://bible.cc/colossians/3-21.htm
21. Fathers, provoke not your children to anger, lest they be discouraged.
